Name: Snowman Adventure
About the game: Snowman Adventure is a third-person platformer. In this cool game you play as John the snowman. You have to get through all the obstacles to complete this game. This game will give you unforgettable emotions of joy and fun. Play it with cheerful and perky music! Would you like to feel like a snowman? If yes, then do not pass by this game. Plunge into the world of fun! Play this third person adventure game! Get real pleasure, passing incredibly difficult and truly dangerous tests. It will be incredibly Lego to die in this game, but it will not be easy to win and reach the end !!! Enjoy playing this game with funny music that will definitely not let you get bored! Features of the game: Fun music and cool atmosphere! Catchy, intuitive gameplay! Incredibly cool levels! Very beautiful graphics! Great music!
